landing.title: Swiss Civic AI Study
landing.subtitle: A study on data donation and trust in open-source AI systems
landing.whatWeStudyText: We study under what conditions people allow anonymized AI interactions to improve a Swiss open-source model.
landing.step1: Use a chatbot to ask about Swiss ballot initiatives
landing.step2: Decide how your anonymized chat inputs may be used for research

consentModal.title: Before you begin
consentModal.vote: You are eligible to vote in Switzerland
consentModal.voluntary: Your participation is voluntary and you may stop at any time

baseline.title: Before We Start
baseline.subtitle: Just 2 quick questions about you

techComfort.question: I am comfortable using new digital technology (like AI chatbots, new apps, or online tools).

privacyConcern.question: In general, I am concerned about how my personal information is used online.

baseline.validationError: Please answer this question to continue

instruction.headline: Try the Chatbot
instruction.text1: Imagine Swiss researchers have built a chatbot to help citizens get clear, unbiased information about upcoming ballot initiatives.
instruction.text2: The chatbot uses Apertus, a Swiss open-source large language artificial intelligence model developed by EPFL, ETH Zurich, and the Swiss National Supercomputing Centre.
instruction.task: Ask the chatbot at least 2 questions about upcoming ballot initiatives.
instruction.example1: What is the Klimafonds Initiative about?
instruction.example2: Explain the Cash Initiative and the counter-proposal.
instruction.example3: What is the National Council's position on "For a fair energy and climate policy"?

donation.title: Help Improve the Apertus Model
donation.dnlIntro: To help you decide, here are key facts about the Apertus model:
donation.baselineText: We would like to use your anonymized questions to improve the Apertus model. Your data will be handled securely and used only for research and model development.
donation.baselineHelp: Donating your questions helps train better AI models.

confirmDonate.title: Thank You!
confirmDonate.message: Your contribution will help improve the Apertus model.
confirmDonate.nextStep: Next: Please answer a few questions about your experience.

confirmDecline.title: Choice Recorded
confirmDecline.message: Thank you for considering this request.
confirmDecline.nextStep: Next: Please answer a few questions about your experience.

dnl.title: About the Apertus Model
dnl.intro: Here's the information you would receive about data handling before making your decision:
dnl.provenanceValue: Built by EPFL, ETH Zurich & CSCS in Switzerland
dnl.ingredientsValue: Only publicly available data from 1,000+ languages & sources
dnl.protectionValue: Personal data removed before training; respects opt-outs
dnl.complianceValue: Follows Swiss privacy & copyright laws, EU AI Act standards
dnl.freshnessValue: Includes Swiss German & Romansh; data through January 2025

dashboard.title: Configure Your Data Donation

scope.label: What data to share
scope.topics: Only topics I asked about (e.g., "climate policy")
scope.full: Full anonymized conversations (your exact questions with all identifying info removed)

dashboard.revocability: You can change these settings in your dashboard anytime.

survey.title: Final Questions
survey.subtitle: Please answer the following questions about your experience

universal.infoQuality1: The information provided about data donation was clear
universal.infoQuality2: I had enough information to make an informed decision

attentionCheck.question: This chatbot helps users with questions about:

transparency.q1: I understood where the Apertus model has been developed
transparency.q2: I know what data the Apertus model was trained on
transparency.q3: The transparency information about the model was helpful
transparency.q4: I understood the privacy protections in place

control.intro: Please tell us about the choices you had:
control.q1: I had control over what happens to my questions.
control.q2: I could choose how my data would be used.
control.q3: I had real options for how to donate.
control.q4: The process gave me the flexibility I wanted.

risk.intro: When thinking about donating your questions, how concerned were you about:
risk.privacy: My questions could be traced back to me
risk.misuse: My data being used for things I don't agree with
risk.companies: Companies making money from my data
risk.trust: Not knowing who is really behind this
risk.security: My data being hacked or stolen

agency.intro: Please tell us how you felt about the data donation choice you just made:
agency.q1: I felt in control of what would happen to my questions.
agency.q2: My choices actually influenced what would happen to my data.
agency.q3: I felt able to make the right decision for myself.

trust.q1: I believe my data would be safe with this chatbot.
trust.q2: I trust the organization behind this chatbot to do the right thing.

acceptableUse.question: What should donated questions be used for?

provenance.question: The Apertus model powering this chatbot was developed in:

scope.question: When thinking about the exact questions you type into the chatbot, which statement comes closest to your view?
scope.summariesOnly: Only general summaries should be used (e.g., "100 people asked about taxes"), not my exact questions
scope.exactAnonymized: My exact questions can be used, as long as they are made fully anonymous and cannot be traced back to me
scope.exactNoProtection: My exact questions can be used without any special privacy protection

purpose.question: Who should be allowed to use your anonymized data for training?
purpose.subInstruction: Please select the most permissive option you are comfortable with.
purpose.noOne: No one should be allowed to use my anonymized data
purpose.swissNonprofitOnly: ONLY the Swiss non-profit association that develops the chatbot
purpose.swissNonprofitAndResearchers: The Swiss non-profit association AND Swiss public researchers (e.g., EPFL/ETH)
purpose.anyAcademic: Any academic or non-profit researcher (Swiss or international)

education.question: What is your highest level of education?

voting.question: Are you eligible to vote in Swiss federal elections?

optional.swissServer: How important is it to you that the Apertus model is hosted on Swiss servers? (Optional)
optional.commentsPlaceholder: Share any additional thoughts or feedback...

openFeedback.question: Was war der Hauptgrund für Ihre Entscheidung?
openFeedback.note: Diese Frage ist optional, aber Ihre Gedanken helfen uns zu verstehen, wie Menschen diese Entscheidungen treffen.

notifyEmail.question: Möchten Sie die Studienergebnisse erhalten?
notifyEmail.note: Optional. Geben Sie Ihre E-Mail-Adresse ein, wenn Sie benachrichtigt werden möchten, sobald die Ergebnisse veröffentlicht werden.

transition.title: Almost done!
transition.message: Finally, just a few questions about yourself...
transition.reminder: REMINDER: The data donation was simulated for research purposes. Your chatbot questions were NOT actually stored.

debrief.title: Thank You for Participating!
debrief.simulationNote: The data donation was SIMULATED. Your chatbot questions were NOT stored or used. Only your survey answers were recorded anonymously.
debrief.studyPurpose: We're researching what makes Swiss citizens comfortable donating their data to train open-source artificial intelligent models. Your responses help design better privacy-respecting AI systems.
debrief.institution: Institution: Digital Business University of Applied Sciences
